name: JingleJam Game Jam Shooter
description:
This whole thing was so much fun to do! This was my first game jam and I would definitely say it was a success!

I focused pretty heavily on the game play so that I would be left with a pretty but boring game, unfortunately I have a fun but ugly one.

Regardless I hope you have fun playing it!!

Controls:

There is a menu screen, but you use:

WASD - Move

SPACE - swing

RMOUSE - shoot

LMOUSE - Talk
